channel.title: PSP2 on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PSP2 on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog

item.title: Why PSP2 is going to succeed
item.description: They actually call it NGP, standing for Next Generation Portable. I wouldn’t really be suprised that much if the name was left unchanged in final product. Anyway, I’ve seen some posts from respected sites saying that PSP2 is doomed, dead on arrival, etc etc … which I think is completely wrong thinking. The basic problem is comparing it to a phone, usually the iPhone. It is true that games are huge on Apple platform, and they are only going to get bigger.
